title: Migration
pageDescription: Transferring an existing virtual infrastructure to the VK Cloud.
shortDescription: How to migrate a local VM image to a VK Cloud project
metaDescription: Transferring an existing virtual infrastructure to the VK Cloud
markdown: VK Cloud supports migration of both individual VMs and the infrastructure as a whole. For the first, it is recommended to use external tools (VM Ware, Hyper-V), for the second â€” [Hystax software](/en/vendors-products/marketplace/initial-configuration/migrate-hystax), operating on the basis of VK Cloud.
